    • addRoleToUser

      public void addRoleToUser(RoleEntity role, UserEntity user)
      This method will add a specified role to a specified user. e.g. roleId: 1 userId: 1 Will add to user with id 1 the role with id 1
      Parameters:
      role - RoleEntity
      user - UserEntity

    • getRolesByUser

      public List<String> getRolesByUser(UserEntity userEntity)
      This method returns a List of string where those strings are the "ROLE_ADMIN" , "ROLE_MODERATOR" roles.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      List
